effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
(4) Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 1.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 869 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 869 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,979 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 184 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Zap yourself for 238,496 Nature damage, gaining 15,433 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
